attributes.action: Stop voting for your own pay rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a former member of the armed forces i did not have any say on my pay rise . I belive MPs should come under the same rules and NOT be allowed to award there own pay rise ,they should get the same % rise as the armed forces , as we the tax payers pay there wages this might have the effect of the armed forces getting more pay for putting there lives at risk every day

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
